title: Systems Administrator
job_description: As a Systems Administrator at PECO Software, you are responsible for ensuring stable operation and security of our IT infrastructure. You will work closely with DevOps and support teams and have a central role in the maintenance of both on-premise and cloud-based environments.
tasks: Monitor and maintain servers and networks
Manage user access and security policies
Backup, recovery, and disaster recovery planning
Automation of routine tasks via scripts
technical_skills: Experience with Windows and Linux servers
Scripting in PowerShell, Bash, or similar
personal_skills: Ability to work proactively and solution-oriented
